title: Former 'Onion' Editor On Why We Need Satire
teaser: Former Onion editor Joe Randazzo reacts to the attack of the French satirical magazine Charlie Hebdo this week.
contentencoded:
Former Onion editor Joe Randazzo reacts to the attack of the French satirical magazine Charlie Hebdo this week.

A version of this essay originally appeared on MSNBC.com.
